title: Couple Console
description:
The sleek and versatile Couple Console (1982) makes storage in hallways, living spaces, even kitchens a breeze. It features two drawers and a combination of closed compartments that allow you to display objects or conceal clutter with ease. A lacquered plinth elevates the unit. The console is part of the Montana Collection, a complete line of storage solutions by Danish designer Peter J. Lassen that bring organization and color to every room in the home. Made in Denmark.
  • Sleek, versatile storage unit ideal for hallways, living spaces, and kitchens.
  • Features two drawers and a combination of closed compartments.
  • Elevate on a stylish plinth.
  • Choose from bold colors and shades to suit your space.
Brand
Montana Furniture
General Dimensions
  • 30¼" H 54⅞" W 15" D
Product Weight
115.75 lbs
Assembly
Requires Assembly
Warranty
DWR honors a one (1) year warranty on all products. Brand-specific warranties may extend to longer periods.

title: Rest Storage Bench
description:
A multifunctional seating and storage sanctuary, the Rest Storage Bench (1982) is ready to revolutionize your space. Its four open compartments and two drawers offer a range of options to showcase special objects or neatly conceal clutter. Its long, streamlined profile is perfect for hallways, entryways, or as a seating solution at the dining table. The bench is part of the Montana Collection, a complete line of storage solutions by Danish designer Peter J. Lassen that brings organization and color to every room in the home. Made in Denmark.
  • Multifunctional storage and seating unit.
  • Four open compartments and two drawers.
  • Choose from a range of colors to suit your space.
Brand
Montana Furniture
General Dimensions
  • 16¾" H 82¼" W 15" D
Product Weight
82.75 lbs
Assembly
Requires Assembly
Warranty
DWR honors a one (1) year warranty on all products. Brand-specific warranties may extend to longer periods.

title: Miro Dresser
description:
In designing the Miro Dresser (2022), designer Gabriel Tan had several must-haves in mind: functionality, beauty, and choice. Mission accomplished. Available with five or six drawers, there is a Miro Dresser to fit any space or wardrobe. Gracefully rounded corners and slender drawer pulls soften the silhouette, and soft-closing glides prevent interior contents from shifting. This dresser can be paired with the Miro Bed or with a variety of different bed styles. Made in Estonia.
  • Rounded edges and legs.
  • Slim cabinet frames maximize the amount of drawer space.
  • Roomy drawers with soft-close glides.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Miro Collection
General Dimensions
  • 33" H 59⅛" W 18¾" D
Product Weight
234.25 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Morrison Dresser
description:
Designed by all-female trio Egg Collective, the Morrison Dresser (2012) is a modern interpretation of classic casegoods. The expertly crafted piece is available in two configurations: a wide, 6-drawer version and a tall, 5-drawer version; each offers ample room to store clothes and sundries. A marble top, solid-brass knobs, soft-closing hardware, and leveling feet add extra beauty and convenience. Part of the Morrison storage collection. Made in Canada.
  • Wooden dresser with generously sized drawers.
  • Available in both wide and tall configurations.
  • White Carrara or Verde Indio marble top.
  • Solid brass knobs and leveling feet; soft-closing hardware.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Morrison Collection
General Dimensions
  • 32" H 74" W 20" D
Product Weight
298.5 lbs
Assembly
Requires Assembly
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Perforated Wardrobe Locker
description:
Practical and attractive storage for any room, the Perforated Wardrobe Locker (2016) is made of durable steel that’s finely finished in a range of subtle shades. The roomy interior includes one adjustable shelf. All Tolix furniture is still made in Autun, the same Burgundy town where the company first began. Tolix holds the Entreprise du Patrimoine Vivant (EPV) label, a mark that distinguishes the company for its craftsmanship and industrial excellence.
  • Perforated doors permit airflow and hint at the contents placed inside.
  • Comes with one adjustable shelf.
  • Oak handles offer warm material contrast to its steel construction.
  • A range of rich colors to suit a variety of interiors.
  • Made in France.
Brand
Tolix
General Dimensions
  • 75⅞" H 31½" W 19¾" D
Product Weight
176.5 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
Terms and conditions apply. Learn more

title: Line Storage Bench
description:
A customer favorite since its debut, the Line Collection features geometric frames made out of precisely crafted oak or walnut. It's distinguished by its strong horizontal lines that reflect natural landscapes and lend a sense of restfulness and calm. The Line Storage Bench (2019) features a lift-up top with convenient lid-stay hardware, providing room for storing extra linens, clothes, and more. Made in Malaysia.
  • Sleek modern storage bench.
  • Versatile storage solution for small spaces.
  • Lift-up top with convenient lid-stay hardware.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Line Collection
General Dimensions
  • 15½" H 60" W 19¾" D
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty
